Title: GDPR/CCPA non-compliance
Plan: Implement unified consent management, tighten data retention rules, and run weekly audits on CX data pipelines.

Title: Model latency spikes in production
Plan: Deploy autoscaling for inference, add latency SLOs, and create auto-rollbacks on regression.

Title: Bot misrouting high-value CX cases
Plan: Refine routing logic with human-in-the-loop review, add guardrails for VIP accounts, and create clear fallback to live agents.

Title: Escalation routing gaps between Slack and Wrike
Plan: Standardize escalation channels, create a single incident room per major issue, and enforce runbook usage.

Title: Under-trained frontline agents on AI-assisted workflows
Plan: Launch targeted enablement, in-app guidance, and QA reviews on AI-assisted resolutions.

Title: Reporting and telemetry outages in CX dashboards
Plan: Harden ETL jobs, add monitoring and on-call rotations, and document failover dashboards.
